text:
="preserve">Crown Prince Hyojang (Korean:효장세자 hanja:孝章世子, February 15, 1719 - November 16, 1728) is a member of the Joseon dynasty. His real name is Yi Haeng(이행), and his chinese name is Sungkyung(성경).
He is the first son of crown prince Yeongjo of Joseon. He is the elder half-brother of Crown Prince Sado. He died when he was 9 years old. The cause is unknown.
